topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542a0de663687205c1950100#post_542a0de663687205c1950100
It's mostly the characters. Now take I have only seen season 1 but if a character wasn't a complete jackass they were either completely 1-dimensional or stupid as fuck. That and they ruined Amon as a villain and character with the finale.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542a0e7d63687232278d0000#post_542a0e7d63687232278d0000
i will say if you plan to continue
you might want to just skip season 2 and just read up the important details
season 3 is pretty baller
the villains are great
and some serious shit actual happens
people die
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542a0efb6368720eab980100#post_542a0efb6368720eab980100
My biggest qualm from season 1 is Korra herself. She was a total asshole who never wanted to take responsibilty for her own actions. And this may be selfish of me but when your job is the protection of the world you don't get to sit in a corner and worry about "What if he doesn't love me." Seriously what does ANYONE see in Mako? He's soooooooooo fucking boring. He has no personality whatsoever.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542a0e7d63687232278d0000#post_542a0e7d63687232278d0000
Season 1 and 2 were pretty Meh.

1) cuz like you said they fucked up Ammon as a villain and 2) Cuz of a lot of reasons.

But 3 though, 3 they finally stopped smoking crack and kept a straight head.

So I agree with Marc, if you ever decide to continue _skip season 2_. 

Just read up on the important things.
